rows.label: bf04120170_0010
rows.name:
So what's the plan? Looks like there's quite
a few of 'em, and they have Blades too.

rows.label: bf04120170_0020
rows.name: No time for complicated plans.

rows.label: bf04120170_0030
rows.name: Don't worry - they'll be no match for us!

rows.label: bf04120170_0040
rows.name: I knew you'd say that.

rows.label: bf04120170_0050
rows.name: But hey, I'm not saying you're wrong!

rows.label: bf04120170_0060
rows.name:
Just remember, we're not here to kill anyone,
so mind you don't go overboard.

rows.label: bf04120170_0070
rows.name: Was boss not going to avenge village?

rows.label: bf04120170_0080
rows.name: There's more than one way to do that, right?

rows.label: bf04120170_0090
rows.name: Well, if you say so.

rows.label: bf04120170_0100
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: bf04120170_0110
rows.name: Right. Let's go!

rows.label: bf04120170_0120
rows.name:
All of you put down your weapons!
You're not going to harm that city!

rows.label: bf04120170_0130
rows.name:
Who the hell are you punks?
We ain't got time for a bunch of kids!

rows.label: bf04120170_0140
rows.name: Hold it! They're Drivers and Blades!

rows.label: bf04120170_0150
rows.name: Now I get it... The city hired you, huh?!

rows.label: bf04120170_0160
rows.name: What d'you think?

rows.label: bf04120170_0170
rows.name: Bah! How'd you find out about...

rows.label: bf04120170_0180
rows.name: ...Whatever.

rows.label: bf04120170_0190
rows.name: Hey, lads! Let's slaughter these brats!

rows.label: bf04120170_0200
rows.name: We'll make an example of 'em!

rows.label: bf04120170_0210
rows.name: Yeah!
